name: MuPDF
summary: A lightweight PDF and XPS viewer.
description:
MuPDF is a small, fast, and yet complete PDF viewer. 
It supports PDF 1.7 with transparency, encryption, 
hyperlinks, annotations, searching and more. It also
reads XPS and OpenXPS documents. Licensed under the AGPL.
Commercial licensing is also available, contact
sales@artifex.com.
prepare_command: sed -i '' 's/make -j4 -C/make -C/g' build_libs.sh && xcodebuild -project MuPDF.xcodeproj -scheme MuPDF -configuration Release -sdk iphoneos CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="" CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO && xcodebuild -project MuPDF.xcodeproj -scheme MuPDF -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=NO CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="" CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO && cd libmupdf/build && for i in mupdf mupdfthird; do lipo -create -output lib${i}.a release-ios-i386-x86_64/lib${i}.a release-ios-armv7-arm64/lib${i}.a; done && mv libmupdf.a libmupdfcore.a && cd ../.. && mkdir -p dist/{include/mupdf,src} && cp -R Classes/*.h common.h libmupdf/include/mupdf/* dist/include/mupdf && cp Classes/*.m common.m dist/src && cp -f -p libmupdf/build/libmupdf*.a dist && find dist -name '*.[mh]' -exec perl -pi -e 's,#import "Mu,#import "mupdf/Mu,' {} + && find dist -name '*.[mh]' -exec perl -pi -e 's,#include "common.h",#include "mupdf/common.h",' {} + && find dist -name memento.h -exec perl -pi -e 's,#include <memory.h>,#include <stdlib.h>,' {} +
